name: Buffalo Americas LC6254b BUFFALO DriveStation Axis Velocity 2 TB USB 3.0 Desktop Hard Drive - HD-LX2.0TU3

reviews.name: Buffalo Technology DriveStation Axis Velocity 2TB USB 3.0 External Hard Drive with Hardware Encryption, Black
reviews.reviewText: No problems so far...USB3 a MAJOR plus.....much faster than USB2!
reviews.title: Fast, quiet

reviews.name: Buffalo Technology DriveStation Axis Velocity 2TB USB 3.0 External Hard Drive with Hardware Encryption, Black
reviews.reviewText: I needed extra storage and I didn't want to spend a lot cause I don't have a lot. Great deal!
reviews.title: As easy as you want it to be.

reviews.name: Buffalo Technology DriveStation Axis Velocity 2TB USB 3.0 External Hard Drive with Hardware Encryption, Black
reviews.reviewText: I have had no problems with the device connnecting to multiple operationg systems (Windows XP, 7, and 8). It also has a nice feature that allows 2.0 and 3.0 support so it will work anywhere. Would buy again.
reviews.title: Great so far!

reviews.name: Buffalo Technology DriveStation Axis Velocity 2TB USB 3.0 External Hard Drive with Hardware Encryption, Black
reviews.reviewText: Buffalo Technology DriveStation Axis Velocity 2TB USB 3.0 External Hard Drive with Hardware Encryption, Black offers something for everyone. Having a music studio at home, I required an external that was fast (7500 RPM) and reliable (trusted brand name with proven technology).
reviews.title: Low Cost High Benefit!

reviews.name: Buffalo Technology DriveStation Axis Velocity 2TB USB 3.0 External Hard Drive with Hardware Encryption, Black
reviews.reviewText:
I was looking for a fast,7200rpm, drive, usb easy connection.
This meets and exceeds my expectation. Simple USB connection, portable from one computer to another. I have several. and it has a ton of storage space.
Hard to find a fast 7200 RPM drive at this kind of good price.
I would highly recommend this drive for anyone who needs more storage space that is easy to connect and has great speed for access.
reviews.title: great,fast drive
